column1: Table 37. General situation of government employee and school staff insurance

column2: 1.自81年度起，垃圾處理量含自行或委託清運至垃圾場(廠)之一般事業廢棄物，故平均每日垃圾清運量與處理量總計不相等。

column1: Note: (1) End of year (2) Including RGEI (3) Amendment to the GESSI Act was implemented on June 1, 2014. “Old age” and “Death” benefits separately
were divided into two parts, pension and lump sum. (4) Maternity benefit came into operation on June 1, 2014.
